name: A Little Rabbit Story
description:
In the game "A Little Rabbit Story" you have to control the rabbit and use the control buttons to make the rabbit do different things.

Rabbit - is a foul mouthed, short tempered. He's tired of the neglect and lack of appreciation from his magician.

Wave your magic wand to cast spells and have Harvey perform small tasks around his house. He's always grumpy so you can expect a mouthful of abuse for your efforts.
